channel.title: Reporting on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Reporting on Automaly

item.title: Document Reporting Services (SSRS)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) for creating and managing business documents and reports in Dynamics 365 Finance Operations.

item.title: Deploy SSRS reports in Dynamics 365 Finance, SCM using Powershell
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Deploy SSRS reports to Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations environments using PowerShell scripts. Automate report deployment for all reports or specific reports with DeployAllReportsToSSRS script.

item.title: Extend the standard reports in Dynamics 365 finance and operations (CustAccountStatementExt)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete tutorial for extending standard Customer Account Statement reports in D365 Finance Operations using SSRS, COC extensions, and customization techniques.

item.title: Expressions or Functions used in SSRS
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive reference guide covering all SSRS expressions and functions including globals, operators, text, date/time, math, and aggregate functions for SQL Server Reporting Services.

item.title: Architecture overview Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive architectural overview of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 system components including AOS, client-server communication, model store, Enterprise Portal, security, workflow, and reporting infrastructure. Essential guide for AX 2012 architects and solution developers.
